title: Dish in the Form of a Fish
period: Late Third Intermediate Period to Saite Period
description:
Half of a toilet dish in the form of a fish and executed in stone (schist?). The fish's body is covered with incised lines to indicate scales.

Condition: Tail missing; small nicks and scratches.
dimensions: 2 3/4 x 5/8 x 3 15/16 in. (7 x 1.6 x 10 cm)fish is 6.9 cm. x 9.9 cm.; h. of vessel 1.7 cm.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
